Data:
==Applies To==

* PCI DSS Requirement 7.2.3

==Policy Statement==

Deny all access by default.

==Policy Purpose==

Access control systems should have a "deny-all" default to ensure that all access is explicitly authorized.

==Related Guidance==

* [[2a39f1e5-191d-4113-bff9-281d1540a801|Deny All Access by Default]]

==Related Checklist Items==

* [[095d72e1-91d1-431a-aa96-c66470688da4|All Access Is Denied by Default]]
